title: Cherry Pie (2013)
overview: Zoé tries to escape herself. She travels north through bleak landscapes until she gets on a ferryboat where a mysterious woman suddenly disappears. In the winter coat of a stranger, Zoé reaches the other side of the Channel.
storyline: Zoé tries to escape herself. She travels north through bleak landscapes until she gets on a ferryboat where a mysterious woman suddenly disappears. In the winter coat of a stranger, Zoé reaches the other side of the Channel.
